name: Codename 0G
description:
Have you ever wanted to bounce around on asteroids in space? Float around next to large rocks in zero gravity? Well this brave bean-stronaut sure has!

Mouse - Control Camera
Left Mouse Button - Grapple towards object in crosshair

Credits:
Boyan Dobrev - 3D and some bug/quality of life fixes
Juan C. Osorio A. - Code

Made for Professor Baranyai's Build a Toy class
University of Europe for Applied Sciences
